data: I have 14+ years wide experience in software development industry.
I work(ed) on primarily Python, django, Tornado, SQL, PlSql, Postgres, Mysql, Php & secondarily React . Vue . Svelte . Node . HTML5 . JS .
I am versatile & passionate developer with decent soft skills.
I work in multi functional & multi cultural team(s).
I handle(d) engineering processes e.g. Change / Incident / Release using ServiceNOW.
I work on Agile, Scrum and SDLC modes of software deliveries.
I have experience in leading team of software developers.
